sentence.text: Episodic ataxia cardiac muscle tissue development 2 (positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration) is an autosomal dominant disorder associated with attacks of ataxia that are typically precipitated by stress, ethanol, caffeine or exercise.

entity.text: positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration

sentence.text: Thus, it is possible that subtle dysfunction arising from multiple cell cardiac muscle tissue developments is necessary for the expression of certain ataxia syndromes.
